member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.Ocr.Assembly
member.summary: Utility class to force dynamic loading of this assembly in the Xamarin platform.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.Ocr.OcrObjectsManager
member.summary: Creates an OCR objects manager that extracts text features in a form. The created object is added to Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.FormRecognitionEngine.ObjectsManagers.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.Ocr.OcrObjectsManager.#ctor(Leadtools.Ocr.IOcrEngine)
member.summary: Initializes a new OcrObjectsManager class object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.Ocr.OcrObjectsManager.Engine
member.summary: Gets or sets the OCR engine.
member.value: The Leadtools.Ocr.IOcrEngine that is used in this OcrObjectsManager to perform Ocr
